meanings.sent1: The wheaty fields swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The bread had a wheaty aroma that filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The wheaty scarecrow in the field seemed to be guarding the crops.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the color of wheaty fields under the golden sun.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the wheaty cereal brought back memories of the countryside.

meanings.sent1: The soup had a warm, wheaty flavor that reminded me of home.
meanings.sent2: The beer had a rich, wheaty aftertaste that lingered on the palate.
meanings.sent3: The wheaty pancakes were a hit at the breakfast table.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a wheaty quality that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the wheaty scent of freshly baked bread.
